original_title: Mississippi Madam: The Life of Nellie Jackson
overview: In 1902 Nellie Jackson, an African-American woman born into poverty in Possum Corner, Miss., travels north to Natchez and opens "Nellie's," a brothel she ran for more than 60 years with full knowledge of police and Natchez officials until a fiery end one hot July night in 1990.
title: Mississippi Madam: The Life of Nellie Jackson
